body_html:
Hi @kateiyas - I think I know what's going on here. The default binary builds are generated without OpenCV and ffmpeg dependency, which means that these operators (all of those under caffe2/video/) aren't built. You'll need to build from source to have these operators available.

We should update the R2Plus1 tutorial to make a note of this.

cc @pjh5 @Yangqing @soumith on whether we want to provide a CV version of these with the above enabled.
body_text:
Hi @kateiyas - I think I know what's going on here. The default binary builds are generated without OpenCV and ffmpeg dependency, which means that these operators (all of those under caffe2/video/) aren't built. You'll need to build from source to have these operators available.
We should update the R2Plus1 tutorial to make a note of this.
cc @pjh5 @Yangqing @soumith  on whether we want to provide a CV version of these with the above enabled.
body:
Hi @kateiyas - I think I know what's going on here. The default binary builds are generated *without* OpenCV and ffmpeg dependency, which means that these operators (all of those under caffe2/video/) aren't built. You'll need to build from source to have these operators available.

We should update the R2Plus1 tutorial to make a note of this.

cc @pjh5 @Yangqing @soumith  on whether we want to provide a CV version of these with the above enabled.
